CustomField.description: Stores the 4-digit Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code representing the industry associated with the insured entity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the 4-digit SIC code that corresponds to the insured party’s primary industry or business activity. SIC codes are used to classify industries and are often required for underwriting, risk assessment, and reporting purposes. Example: • 8011 = Offices and Clinics of Doctors of Medicine • 5411 = Grocery Stores • 7372 = Prepackaged Software You can look up codes at www.osha.gov/sic or refer to your company’s SIC reference list.
CustomField.label: Standard Industry Code (SIC)
